apihelp-query+imageforpage-summary: Pre-renders and provides URLs to images for a given page in the "Page:" namespace.
apihelp-query+imageforpage-param-prop: Which types of images or properties of images to return for a given page in the "Page:" namespace.
apihelp-query+imageforpage-paramvalue-pr: Return the filename associated with the page being queried
Return the size of the image associated with the page being queried
Return the URL of the full-sized image associated with the page being queried
Return a list containing the URLs of images at 1x, 1.5x and 2x of the fullsized image associated with the page being queried
apihelp-query+defaultcontentforpage-summ:
Provides the default content for a given page in the "Page:" namespace.

The default content is raw wikitext (potentially including raw HTML tags from untrusted book text layers). It must not be used in HTML unescaped/unparsed!
apihelp-query+proofread-summary: Returns information about the current proofread status of the given pages.
apihelp-query+proofread-example-1: Return proofread status for pages in namespace 250
apihelp-query+proofreadinfo-summary: Return information about configuration of ProofreadPage extension.
apihelp-query+proofreadinfo-param-prop:
Which proofread properties to get:
;namespaces:Information about "{{ns:Page}}" and "{{ns:Index}}" namespaces.
;qualitylevels:List of proofread quality levels.
apihelp-query+proofreadpagesinindex-summ: List the pages in a given index
apihelp-query+proofreadpagesinindex-para: Limit how many pages will be returned
The page ID of the Index page to get pages for
Which properties to get for each page
Return the page ID of each page linked to the index page
Return the page title of each page linked to the index page
Return the page ID of each page linked to the index page
Return the formatted page numbers of each page linked to the index page
Return the formatted page numbers of each page linked to the index page. Deprecated, use "formattedpagenumber" instead.
The title of the Index page to get pages for
